channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rocks and tarmac left on the grass of Kipling Road, 13th October
item.description:
The people doing the fibre broadband seem to have filled in the grass with rubble and tarmac instead of soil and they’ve also left a square block of tarmac underneath the road sign

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken grit bin, 13th October
item.description:
Grit bin broken

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Rushworth Close, Cheltenham

item.title: Dumped bike, road cone and litter, 13th October
item.description:
Litter, child's bike, road cone, rug etc in bushed at side of alleyway running alongside Rushworth Close.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Rushworth Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and noise pollution from Rowanfield exchange shops shops, 13th October
item.description:
Yeah air-conditioning and refrigeration units are in a poor state of repair. This means that they are making excessive noise for the residents. Multipack wrappers from the shop all littering the planted area at the back infront of the houses again affecting the residents. Please ask environmental health or the neighbourhood team to investigate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Cornwall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped beds and mattresses, 13th October
item.description:
Beds and mattresses fly tipped in gateway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4070, Birdlip

item.title: Verges, 12th October
item.description:
The “grass” verge on Dog Lane was cut, however in several places this has dragged brambles and bushes into the road. These require cutting back and are all on highways land.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown pavement, 12th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rowan Cottage Dog Lane, Witcombe

item.title: Kipling Road pavement destroyed by heavygood vehicles, 11th October
item.description:
The pavement at the bottom of Kipling Road has been trashed by heavy vehicles they’re all ridges and bumps standing 10 cm proud of the surface I’m drop ways of 15 cm

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Kipling Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Man hole cover in road., 10th October
item.description:

item.title: Blocked gully, 8th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 282a London Road, Charlton Kings
